blackjack.logic

Class Dealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjack.logic.Player
      • blackjack.logic.Dealer

  • public class Dealer
extends Player
    This class is used mainly for storing the dealers hand and logic for drawing cards.
    Author:
    Jari Avikainen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dealer(String name, int id, int money)
      Generates a new dealer using given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustBet(int newBet)
      Ignores the parameter and does nothing.
      boolean isAI()
      Can be used to check whether the player is an AI or not in the sense that AI players are supposed to be able to play their hands independently.
      boolean isDealer() 
      void playHand(Shoe shoe)
      Plays the current hand by taking more cards from the shoe until satisfied.

      • Methods inherited from class blackjack.logic.Player

        addCard, addMoney, clearHand, getCurrentBet, getHand, getID, getMoney, getName, setCurrentBet, takeMoney

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dealer

        public Dealer(String name,
              int id,
              int money)
        Generates a new dealer using given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the dealer. This is "Dealer" by default.
        id - The id used for connecting the dealer to the corresponding play area in the UI. This should be 3 for the dealer.
        money - The amount of money dealer has in the beginning. This should be zero, since dealer doesn't place bets like ordinary players.

    • Method Detail

      • adjustBet

        public void adjustBet(int newBet)
        Ignores the parameter and does nothing.
        Overrides:
        adjustBet in class Player
        Parameters:
        newBet - Parameter is ignored.

      • isAI

        public boolean isAI()
        Description copied from class: Player
        Can be used to check whether the player is an AI or not in the sense that AI players are supposed to be able to play their hands independently.
        Specified by:
        isAI in class Player
        Returns:
        true, if the player is an AI and false, if the player is human-controlled.

      • isDealer

        public boolean isDealer()
        Overrides:
        isDealer in class Player

      • playHand

        public void playHand(Shoe shoe)
        Description copied from class: Player
        Plays the current hand by taking more cards from the shoe until satisfied. The exact implementation depends on the type of player.
        Specified by:
        playHand in class Player
        Parameters:
        shoe - The shoe from which the new cards are taken.
